column1: Enhancing Skills of Sri Lankan Tour Guides
Despite these challenges, the passion for guiding remains high, with many TGs expressing a solid
commitment to their profession. Hence, in the qualitative discussions, some of the TGs suggested
a solution to reduce the vulnerability of this employment problem. One such solution is ensuring
workforce management companies recruit freelancers and groom them with more transferable
knowledge, hire them for tour operators during the tourism season, and occupy them in other
related occupations during the off-season. Another suggestion is that Tour Operators recruit the
